abstract: Google is expected to unveil a new ad planning tool Tuesday designed to help media buyers identify a Web site’s demographic audience with more precision.
snippet: Google is expected to unveil a new ad planning tool Tuesday designed to help media buyers identify a Web site’s demographic audience with more precision.
lead_paragraph: Google is expected to introduce a new ad-planning tool for agencies and marketers at an industry conference on Tuesday.

headline.main: Google to Introduce New Ad-Planning Tool
